title: • Multi-Container with Multiple web applications
text: First, we have an older post by @valexeev detailing how to set up Multi-Container with Multiple web applications which utilizes a reverse proxy allowing you to route traffic to multiple services on the same port.

title: • Camera streamer & player with auto discovery
text: Next up, we have another project from Robert on our forums detailing the setup of a Camera streamer & player with auto discovery which works great as a baby-monitor camera!

title: • dotnet core SDK for balenaCloud
text: @rhysjtevans started putting together a community dotnet core SDK for balenaCloud.
